name: Kryptel Lite Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .EDC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After Kryptel Lite is installed, files may be encrypted into EDC files in Windows by right-clicking them and selecting the Encrypt option. They can be decrypted using pre-defined passphrase.

description: File encrypted by Kryptel Lite, a program used to securely store and backup files using Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) encryption; contains the encrypted contents of a source file; used to protect individual files for secure storage.
